name: Social Clips
description: Create viral short clips for social media
author: raymAIzing film

steps.prompt:
Create {{clipCount}} social media clips for {{platform}}:

SOURCE CONTENT:
{{sourceContent}}

EDIT STYLE: {{style}}

For each clip provide:

## CLIP 1
- **Title**: Catchy title
- **Duration**: Optimal length for platform
- **Start Point**: Where to start in source
- **End Point**: Where to end
- **Hook (First 3 seconds)**: What grabs attention
- **Caption**: Engaging caption text
- **On-Screen Text**: Text overlays with timing
- **Music/Sound**: Trending sound recommendation
- **Hashtags**: 10-15 relevant hashtags
- **Best Posting Time**: Day and time
- **Viral Potential**: Score 1-10

[Repeat for all clips]

## POSTING SCHEDULE
- Recommended order to post
- Spacing between posts
- Cross-platform strategy
